ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Something that WASNT in the patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: The song is available in Kelethin-around 22-25 plat depending on your Charisma.Tried  to use it without a flute and no effect-  tried it on  FP guards, so they
ygData.messageBody:
The song is available in Kelethin-around 22-25 plat depending on your
Charisma.Tried to use it without a flute and no effect- tried it on FP
guards, so they may have a high resist. It was late and I was falling
asleep at the keyboard- so I'll try it tomorrow, :)
Scanna Swiftsinger
39th Chorus
Bertoxx Server

Liani Mistweaver wrote:

> I'm not sure which vendor sells it, however a 46th level bard in my guild
> found the 39th level song today after the patch. I was logging when he
> started yelling about it, so I didnt get which town... all I saw was "the
> girl in the back". That could mean any of the guildhouses.
>
